name: Under the leg
description: The disc passes under the leg from the front. Right hand under right leg, left hand under left leg.

name: Chair
description: Crouch down as if sitting on a chair, catch the disc under your legs.

name: Flamingo
description: Stand on one leg, catch the disc with the same hand as the standing leg.

name: Behind the head
description: Reach behind your head with one hand, to catch or take the disc.

name: Gitis
description: Extend your hand across your body and raise the opposing leg. Catch or take the disc under the leg.

name: Barrel
description: Jump while spinning, catch the disc while still in the air.
